name: Convex Transact
description: Execute a transaction against a Convex peer

address.description: Origin account address to use for the transaction

source.description: Convex Lisp source code to transact

seed.description: Ed25519 signing seed for the transaction

errorCode.description: Error code, if an error occurred

result.description: Result of the query, as Convex printed data structure.

value.description: Result of the query, as JSON (some type distinctions may be lost).
